reviews.review: Te saca sustos muy buenos jajajajjaa sobre todo cuando empiezas a jugar
adrenalina, terror, accion, es todo una leyenda este juego, si no lo jugaste dale play que esto te enviciara y estaras sentado comiendo cuates mientras juegas.

This game is good... prettttty goood. This is Left 4 Dead a valve game that came out in 2008. It is a zombie game but don't let that change your mind. This is a singleplayer/4 player Co-Op game where you and 3 other people/computers fight for your lives to escape. Well lets get a bit deeper.

Story.

It doesn't really tell a story, I know there is one but you hardly get any if you're just running through it, BUT if you take your time and look at the walls you can see some stuff. There is plenty of video talking about that stuff so yeah. Sorry.

Gameplay.

Pretty good. Kinda reminds me of Serious Sam but there is alot more enemies. You shoot gun at zombie a couple times and it dies. There is a shoving ability which you use with the right mouse button. I use it a lot. I might even use it too much. The way to go is sometimes strange but other than that it's straight forward.

Enemies.

You have the basic infected with hit you and make up most of the swarm. There is the boomers and they throw up on you, and you want to be far from them when you kill them since they BLOW up when you kill them. There is the Tanks and they charge at you and are really annoying since it is hard to dodge, and they throw pieces of the floor at you for some damage. There is the hunter which jumps on you and fall down and need another person to knock it off. Oh yeah you can fall over when overwhelmed with zombies or a Tank knocks you down. Finally there is the smoker which grabs you with it's tongue. Final Finally there is the witch which if you disturb her she runs straight towards you! Also she cries.

Multiplayer.

I can't review i since you get many different experiences with different people.

Achievements

The achievements are pretty specific much like the second game, BUT you will most likely get all of them by playing the game a lot.

Great game all around! If I missed anything please tell me. It's a great FPS zombie game and you should buy it. Smoker/10.

(Buy this and Left 4 Dead 2 since it has a different feeling.)
one time i was playing with bots in the hospital level. a smoker got me before the elevator came and incapacitated me. all the other bots just looked at me and stared while i slowly died.

[h1]LEFT BECAUSE DEAD[/h1]
[h1]1st Feel[/h1]
[list][*]Old but Good.
[*]Good but Old.
[*]Reminds me about my childhood.

[/list]
[h1]2nd Thought[/h1]
[list][*]Outdated gameplay, poor storyline and bored weapons.
[*]Just only recommended when you have 3 more friends. If you are alone player, you may get doze after playing for a while.


[/list]
[h1]3rd Look[/h1]
[list][*]High featured zombie design. AI is not the pros and the cons is low quality environment.
[*]If you are looking zombie shooting game, do not buy this game. It used to be hot several years ago, but now is outmoded.
[*]If you still wanna play the game, you should choose Left 4 Dead 2 - same campaign, improved graphic and better multiplayer mode.
[/list]

A game that revolutionised games as we know it. But there is no reason to buy this anymore 

Left for Dead is a game that I love, 4 player co-op is something that is a trope of most fps games these days, if its no PVP there is 4 player online co-op, most of the time. This game has some amazing campaigns with some amazing set pieces that look amazing even to this day. BUT, this game doesn't need to be played anymore because Left for Dead 2 is a thing and it has all of the campaigns of the first game, the second game, cold stream which used to be a mod that got added in to the game on the PC, AND workshop mods. There is honestly no point to getting this game anymore.

I recommend this game but play all of the campaigns in the second game, better engine, more weapons and mods, no point getting this game anymore.
